confirm_email.subject: アカウント有効化のための確認メール
confirm_email.text:
Selfinityです。下記のリンクからSelfinityにアクセスしてアカウントを有効化させましょう。このリンクは第三者に見られるとアカウントを奪われる危険があるので自己責任のもとで適切に管理しましょう。

{url}

Cheers

Your friends at Selfinity

confirm_again_email.subject: Your Selfinity account is waiting...
confirm_again_email.text:
You recently tried signing up for Selfinity — a place to get paid for posting and sharing good content.
We weren't able to confirm your email address. Click this new email confirmation link to finish setting up your account:

{url}

Cheers

Your friends at Selfinity.

delete_password_email.subject: パスワード初期化のための確認メール
delete_password_email.text:
Selfinityです。下記のリンクからSelfinityにアクセスするとパスワード初期化が初期化されます。このリンクは第三者に見られるとアカウントを奪われる危険があるので自己責任のもとで適切に管理しましょう。

{url}

Cheers

Your friends at Selfinity

create_account.subject: One last step to set up your account
create_account.text:
Hi again,

Good news! Your account information has been verified.

Click on this link to finish setting up your account.

{url}

 Cheers,
Your friends at Selfinity

reject_account.subject: Your account is under review
reject_account.text:
Thanks for signing up to Selfinity. Your request to create an account is currently under review. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

 Cheers,
Your friends at Selfinity
